column6: A special issue showcasing the different sides of Prince Namor: proud king, valiant hero-and arrogant, unfaithful lover. Years ago, when Namor was young, he fell in love with a surface woman, only to break her heart. But what is her connection to the new generation of X-Men? A stand-alone story that sets the stage for an unexpected new NAMOR storyline!  32 PGS./Rated T  ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Mike Mayhew | penciller:Ariel Olivetti | writer:Stuart Moore
